author: Aaron Jones
description:
Empire of the Dawn continues the brilliant tale of the silversaint Gabriel de Leon started in Empire of the Vampire and Empire of the Damned. The third part of trilogies can be difficult to pull off but Kristoff works his bloody magic here with Gabriel continuing his story for the historian Jean-Francois with more drinking, […]

The post REVIEW: Empire of the Dawn by Jay Kristoff appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Empire of the Dawn by Jay Kristoff
